title: Power - two blocks slide across a surface

content.question: Two identical blocks slide a distance <math alttext="D" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>D</mi></math> across a rough horizontal surface, as shown. Block <math alttext="A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mtext>A</mtext></math> has an initial velocity of <math alttext="v sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></math> and Block <math alttext="B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mtext>B</mtext></math> has an initial velocity of <math alttext="the fraction v sub 0, end sub, over 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><msub><mi>v</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mn>2</mn></mfrac></math>. Both blocks are still moving after sliding a distance <math alttext="D" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>D</mi></math>. Which of the following is a correct expression relating the power <math alttext="P sub A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>P</mi><mtext>A</mtext></msub></math> generated by friction between Block <math alttext="A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mtext>A</mtext></math> and the surface and the power <math alttext="P sub B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>P</mi><mtext>B</mtext></msub></math> generated by friction between Block <math alttext="B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mtext>B</mtext></math> and the surface?

choices.label: <math alttext="open parenthesis, P sub A equals P sub B, close parenthesis, which equals 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><msub><mi>P</mi><mtext>A</mtext></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>P</mi><mtext>B</mtext></msub><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>

<math alttext="open parenthesis, P sub A equals P sub B, close parenthesis, which is greater than 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><msub><mi>P</mi><mtext>A</mtext></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>P</mi><mtext>B</mtext></msub><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>></mo><mn>0</mn></math>
<math alttext="P sub A is less than P sub B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>P</mi><mtext>A</mtext></msub><mo><</mo><msub><mi>P</mi><mtext>B</mtext></msub></math>
<math alttext="P sub A is greater than P sub B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>P</mi><mtext>A</mtext></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>P</mi><mtext>B</mtext></msub></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="P sub A is greater than P sub B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>P</mi><mtext>A</mtext></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>P</mi><mtext>B</mtext></msub></math>

skill.text: 2.C: Compare physical quantities between two or more scenarios or at different times and locations in a single scenario.
